long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Spellborne Wiki Extension
Enhance your gameplay experience with the ultimate extension for Spellborne, the acclaimed monster-catching MMORPG. Developed by Spellborne Wiki, this extension offers a range of indispensable features to boost your performance.

Current Features
Discover Weaknesses: Instantly access the type vulnerabilities of your enemies to gain a strategic edge in battles.
Daycare Info: Easily view detailed insights about your Daycare information for optimal monster management.

Privacy-Centric Operation
We collect daycare data for analytics but do not store any usernames. Key points:

	•	Data Collection: We gather anonymous daycare data for monster analytics.
	•	No Personal Data: Username is hashed and used for analysis like how many monsters there are per player.
	•	Anonymity Assurance: All data is anonymized to ensure user privacy.

Your privacy is important to us, and we are committed to maintaining a secure and anonymous experience.

Community Driven
Join our vibrant community of gamers! Follow Spellborne Wiki on X for the latest updates, tips, and community discussions.

Dynamic Updates
We are committed to continuously improving Spellborne Wiki. Expect regular updates that refine existing features and introduce new capabilities based on valuable community feedback.

Installation and Compatibility
Installing and setting up Spellborne Wiki is quick and easy. Simply add the extension, and it will be active when you visit Spellborne.gg. During battles, the extension will automatically display enemies' weaknesses. You can also find more detailed Daycare info when you click on the icon of the extension.
